refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Calling this function will poison the current transaction. This means that it is forced to roll back at when committed. The code can be in integer that selects the error message generated when trying to commit. This is useful before signalling application errors from SQL code that runs in manual commit mode. This can ensure that even if the client attempts a commit after getting the error signalled by the application the transaction will not commit.
In most cases the code should be the constant 6, resulting the in the 'transaction rolled back due to previous SQL Error'.
